title: Almost impossible to get Kayle and Shyvana
body:
It's almost impossible to get Kayle and Shyvana.

Shyvana is sorta contested but she's a tier 3 shouldn't be that hard to get.

Kayle is almost uncontested, yet I still see tons more Anivia and other tier 5 than her. Literally haven't seen someone pick Kayle since the last patch. I get Swains before Kayle and almost all the shapeshifter pickers take Swain.

replies.body: yep, I needed kayle for my 6th noble buff in my last match, dumped 60 gold into rolling for her at level 7, and couldn't find a single one. Nobody had a kayle. Theres no reason I shouldnt have found ONE with 30 fucking rerolls

> [{quoted}](name=BongMage420,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=ijUo42mO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-14T05:59:18.174+0000)
>
> yep, I needed kayle for my 6th noble buff in my last match, dumped 60 gold into rolling for her at level 7, and couldn't find a single one. Nobody had a kayle. Theres no reason I shouldnt have found ONE with 30 fucking rerolls

At level 7, the chance of rolling a tier 5 champ is 2%.  There are currently 7 tier 5 champs, so the chance of getting a Kayle is 0.29%.  Even with 30 rolls, you had ~1/3 chance of finding a Kayle.

If you're looking for a tier 5 champs, you have to be at least level 8 and be willing to spend a lot of gold.  Even at level 8, a 5% chance, you'd still have 2/3 chance of even finding a single Kayle after 30 rerolls (60 gold).  Rolling at level 7 is fine if you're looking for tier 4, but not tier 5.
The difficulty to get Kayle causes the 6 noble composition to be basically imposible to put into play.
